import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { BookAuthor } from '../models'; @Component({ selector: 'app-bookdisplay', templateUrl: './bookdisplay.component.html', styleUrls: ['./bookdisplay.component.css'] }) export class BookdisplayComponent { @Input() title : String=''; @Input() description: String=''; @Input() authors!: BookAuthor[]; @Input() isAdmin!: boolean; }
